channel.title: Comments on: Unattended Ubuntu VM installation with preseed

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
And if you want to use your own account instead of root:
<code> d-i passwd/root-login boolean false d-i passwd/make-user boolean true d-i passwd/user-fullname string Who am I d-i passwd/username string joe d-i passwd/user-password-crypted password ENCRYPTED d-i user-setup/encrypt-home boolean false </code>
item.content:encoded:
And if you want to use your own account instead of root:


d-i passwd/root-login boolean false
d-i passwd/make-user boolean true
d-i passwd/user-fullname string Who am I
d-i passwd/username string joe
d-i passwd/user-password-crypted password ENCRYPTED
d-i user-setup/encrypt-home boolean false

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: If you want to specify IP (instead of get it from DHCP): <code> netcfg/disable_dhcp=true netcfg/confirm_static=true netcfg/get_ipaddress=192.168.0.101 netcfg/get_netmask=255.255.255.0 netcfg/get_gateway=192.168.0.1 netcfg/get_nameservers=8.8.8.8 8.8.8.4 </code>
item.content:encoded:
If you want to specify IP (instead of get it from DHCP):

netcfg/disable_dhcp=true
netcfg/confirm_static=true
netcfg/get_ipaddress=192.168.0.101
netcfg/get_netmask=255.255.255.0
netcfg/get_gateway=192.168.0.1
netcfg/get_nameservers=8.8.8.8 8.8.8.4
